analyzed: a dinna ādānā veramaṇi sikkhāpadam samādiyāmi
surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānā veramaṇi sikkhāpadam samādiyāmi
nacca gīta vādita visūka dassanā veramaṇi sikkhāpadam samādiyāmi
mālā gandha vilepana dhāraṇa maṇḍana vibhūsana ṭṭhānā veramaṇi sikkhāpadam samādiyāmi
jātarūpa rajata paṭiggahaṇā veramaṇi sikkhāpadam samādiyāmi
